__e: We're all alone on this desert island.
- Ha, ha. - I was on a deserted island for five years and I am totally out of practice with this whole...
Doesn't matter anymore on a desert island.
Some guy suddenly jumps you in an isolated place...
Lonely spot like this, we could be murdered in our beds.
Granted that he is alive and wandering around so lonely a place as this, so far from the public road, do you think at this distance of time you could possibly know the man again?
